name: Home Sweet Home (itch)
description:
Welcome to your new single-room smart home! We'll take care of you through these post-apocalyptic times. The smart home has built in terrain and weather-resistant mobility mechanisms to get you from one location to another. It can even find resources like food, wood, and metal for you. Just let the smart home take care of your every need! Worried about defense against other people trying to steal your goods? No need to worry! The smart home can shoot down you fr-enemies or really anything that comes too close. Stay home and ride out the apocalypse!

* Smart doghouse sold separately

Best played on the latest version of Chrome.

Built for the #1RoomRPG jam using PhaserJS, Aesprite, Tiled, PyxelEdit, ChipTone, vim, VSCode.

Handmade, artisanal code by Cindy and Henry :)

Art by Cindy and Henry ~~

Music and Sounds by Henry :D
